title: Improve kthvalue documentation.
body_html:
1. Fix "kth" attr specification -- I can't get sphinx to generate kth,
    but k th works with a space, unlike now where the highlighting continues
    until the next attr.
  2. Specify the size of the return tensors.
  3. Add an example of the return tensor sizes with more than 1 dimension.
body_text:
Fix "kth" attr specification -- I can't get sphinx to generate kth,
but k th works with a space, unlike now where the highlighting continues
until the next attr.
Specify the size of the return tensors.
Add an example of the return tensor sizes with more than 1 dimension.
body:
1) Fix "kth" attr specification -- I can't get sphinx to generate `k`th,
but `k` th works with a space, unlike now where the highlighting continues
until the next attr.
2) Specify the size of the return tensors.
3) Add an example of the return tensor sizes with more than 1 dimension.
